title: The $450 billion question: Can Amazon’s AI gamble justify historic market carnage?
description: Amazon’s stock rebounded slightly after a historic nine-day losing streak that erased over $450 billion in market value, triggered by a massive $200 billion spending plan for 2024. The unprecedented capital expenditure, a 60% surge from 2023, is primarily for artificial intelligence infrastructure, sparking investor fears over severely reduced free cash flow. This aggressive spending […]
content:

title: Nurses and New York hospital system reach a tentative deal to end the city’s largest nursing strike
description: New York City’s largest nursing strike in decades may be on the verge of ending. A union representing more than 4,000 nurses at the NewYork-Presbyterian hospital system reached a tentative contract agreement with management early Friday. The union says provisions include raises topping 12% over three years, staffing improvements and safeguards on the use of artificial intelligence. Union members are voting Friday and Saturday on the proposed contract. If it’s ratified, they'll return to work next week. NewYork-Presbyterian is the last of three major private hospital systems hit by the more than monthlong walkout.
content: NEW YORK (AP) — New York City’s largest nursing strike in decades may be on the verge of ending after a union representing more than 4,000 nurses in the NewYork-Presbyterian hospital system reached a tentative contract agreement with management early... [318 chars]

title: India’s 30 Per Cent Global Output Decline And How AI Can Drive A Civilisational Economic Revival
description: Drawing on historical data highlighted by Angus Maddison and modern digital reforms, author Shailesh Haribhakti argues that artificial intelligence combined with India’s Digital Public Infrastructure can help the nation reclaim long-term global economic scale through trust, sustainability and inclusive growth.
content: There was a time when India did not measure its success in quarterly numbers. It measured itself in knowledge, trust, shared prosperity, and moral order. Long-run economic reconstructions — most prominently those of Angus Maddison and the ongoing Mad... [8104 chars]

title: Love, loneliness and ‘AI psychosis’: Sam Altman warns of emotional risks in the age of artificial intelligence
description: In a recent discussion at Express Adda, Open AI CEO Sam Altman addressed the rise of humans choosing AI for love, suggesting that while some may choose digital partners, most will find that technology only increases the value of real human warmth. He believes that in an automated world, authentic connection and attention will become our most precious commodities.
content: On the side-lines of the India AI Impact Summit 2026, Open AI CEO Sam Altman on Friday sat for a candid chat at the Indian Express Adda. During the conversation, Altman touched upon an interesting phenomena which has generated much curiosity in recen... [3294 chars]

title: AI must strengthen human judgement, ethical responsibility but not replace it: MoE Pradhan
description: New Delhi, Feb 20 (PTI) Artificial Intelligence (AI) must strengthen human judgement, creativity and ethical responsibility, not replace it, Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan said on Friday. The Minister made the comments at the closing ceremony of the India–Spain Conference on Higher Education, where he called upon Spanish universities to set up campuses in India. […]
content:

title: Meta cuts stock awards by 5% for most employees
description: META reduced its annual distribution of stock options by about 5 percent for most of its staff, as CEO Mark Zuckerberg ploughs billions of dollars into its artificial intelligence goals, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.

title: UN touts panel for 'human control' of AI as leaders weigh message
description: NEW DELHI — A new United Nations panel on artificial intelligence (AI) aims to “make human control a technical reality,” the global body’s chief said on Friday as leaders at a summit in New Delhi weighed their message on the future of the divisive technology.

title: Tech Mahindra Partners With NVIDIA To Develop Educational LLM Program
description: Tech Mahindra has formed a strategic partnership with NVIDIA to develop an educational Large Language Model program. This collaboration combines Tech Mahindra's digital transformation expertise with NVIDIA's AI computing capabilities to create innovative educational technology solutions. The partnership represents a significant step forward in applying artificial intelligence to enhance learning experiences in the education sector.
content:
Tech Mahindra has announced a strategic partnership with NVIDIA to develop an educational Large Language Model (LLM) program, marking a significant advancement in AI-driven educational technology solutions.
